Game
Class InputHandler

java.lang.Object
  Game.InputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener
public class InputHandler
extends Object
implements KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener

Handles all of the inputs that we will use in the game. Allows for the user to control the main player. Lukers 1/28/14

          The key class is used for readability.
